name: Garten Of Parody
description:
After little Jack is returned to the kindergarten to find his sister, he finds something more sinister going on... and also his sister is missing.

Garten of Parody is a week-long-developed remake of the well-beloved Garten of BanBan. This was done just to test my skills and knowledge in game design/development and probably won't be worked on further. Please go crazy with the bugs and glitches. 

CONTROLS
WASD - Move
E - Interact
Y - Switch to RC-Car camera

!!DON'T TAKE THIS GAME SERIOUSLY!!

I am not associated with nor endorsed by the Euphoric Brothers. Go support the original games and if they wish for me to remove this, please contact me on Twitter.
